module.name: twenga
module.description: This module allows you to instantly create an optimized export feed for Twenga and to easily install sales tracking
module.description_full: This module allows you to instantly create an optimized export feed for Twenga and to easily install sales tracking.  Export your products to Twenga in just a few clicks and gain new clients!   Don't wait any longer, sign-up right away!
module.additional_description: Twenga, the shopping guide with 9 years of e-commerce experience helps you to sell efficiently. Gain new clients by downloading the Twenga module.      Twenga is a shopping guide that allows millions of online users to find products at the best price in the online store of their choice.    Twenga's merchant program aims to provide e-retailers with the most qualified traffic, no matter what their business sector may be.    Why should you be listed on Twenga?  Sell more by capturing qualified buyers: 4.5 million unique visitors per month  Manage your budget: payment by CPC only and no minimum commitment period  Follow your activity: a complete and reliable traffic tracking interface    We guarantee:    - Create a product export feed that is optimised for Twenga in just 1 click  - Easily install Twenga's sales tracking: benefit from optimised traffic that is focused on your products with high potential  - Free technical and commercial assistance  - Signing up to the merchant program is free and without a minimum commitment period    More than 15,000 e-retailers in Europe have already joined Twenga's traffic platform.    Don't wait any longer, sign-up right away!    The Twenga merchant programm is available in France, Spain, and Italy.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ebay
module.description: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales
module.description_full: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales.   Create your eBay account now to increase your visibility !
module.additional_description: • You could develop a profitable sales channel using eBay as a new route to market. • Your products will reach a global audience of over a hundred million potential buyers. • You can create listings and sell across both channels from one place. • You’ll be able to manage all of your orders across channels helping to prevent over selling.

module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.description: Sell your products to more than 100 million buyers in Europe thanks to our cloud-based platform
module.description_full: Sell your products to more than 100 million buyers in Europe thanks to our cloud-based platform. Launch in new markets, reach more customers and grow your revenue by 30% year on year! Our marketplaces expert team, complemented by our powerful software will provide you with the perfect combination to meet online success.  DISCOVER NETEVEN
module.additional_description: Get the edge over your competitors and save time, money and resources! Sell your products on the world’s leading online marketplaces via one single platform. Using Neteven’s proprietary cloud-based software and bespoke services you can:   gain maximum exposure for your catalogue grow your business and go global optimise your e-commerce distribution benefit from a personalized module to centralise and simply manage your marketplace orders from your Prestashop solution Neteven integrate you with the largest number of leading marketplaces worldwide:   FRANCE: eBay.fr, Amazon.fr, Fnac.com, Cdiscount.com, LaRedoute.fr, Pixmania.com, PriceMinister.fr, RueDuCommerce.com, BrandAlley.fr, Zalando.fr, Atosho.com, Galeries-lafayette.fr, Spartoo.fr UK: eBay.co.uk, Amazon.co.uk, Pixmania.co.uk, Play.com, Zalando.co.uk, Spartoo.co.uk, Atosho.com GERMANY: eBay.de, Amazon.de, Pixmania.de, Otto.de, Zalando.de, Rakuten.de ITALY: eBay.it, Amazon.it, Zalando.it, Pixmania.it, Spartoo.it, Privalia.it SPAIN: eBay.es, Amazon.es, Fnac.es, Pixmania.es, Spartoo.es, Rakuten.es, Privalia.es HOLLAND: eBay.nl, Amazon.nl, Zalando.nl, Pixmania.nl BELGIUM: eBay.be, Amazon.be, Zalando.be, Pixmania.be AUSTRIA: eBay.at, Amazon.at, Zalando.at SWITZERLAND: eBay.ch Amazon.ch, Zalando.ch NORWAY: eBay.no, Amazon.no, Atsoho.no DENMARK: eBay.dk, Amazon.dk, Atsoho.dk USA - CANADA: eBay.com, Amazon.com

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25 !   Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.   Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Hurry up and try Google AdWords today! Or call 08001690713

module.name: firstdata

module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.

module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) emails & SMS. Start now!﻿﻿ With the SendinBlue module, you can find everything you need to easily and efficiently send out email  & SMS campaigns to your prospects and customers.﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ﻿   Enjoy 1-month free trial now with the promo code FREEMERCH14 !
module.additional_description: Both solutions require a fee. Do not hesitate to contact us for a quotation.   High performance have been proven by A/B testingOur patented semantic technology represents the next generation in e-merchandising. It powers the selling strategies that increase sales by 30% through increased conversion and average order value.   Prediggo is a flexible solution that is easy-to-useOur intuitive back-office makes it easy to automate and optimise the most complex merchandising !   Only a few days integration neededPrediggo is the only “complete” solution that does not require integration with your ERP, Cookies or Javascript. Our solutions work on a data export, so they integrate in days, not weeks.    A superior serviceSince we started in 2008, customer service has been one of our core values. So it is no wonder that our customer's have reported a 100% satisfaction rate in our 2012 and 2013 surveys!
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: payplug
module.description: PayPlug : online payment has never been so simple ! No recurring fees, no need for a merchant account !   Create your account now!
module.description_full: PayPlug : online payment has never been so simple ! No recurring fees, no need for a merchant account !   Create your account now!
module.additional_description: Ease of use: Merchants, sign-up on our website, download our plugin, and accept your first credit card payment right away:  no commitment and no need for a merchant account! No sign-in required from your customer ! With PayPlug, your clients just have to fill their credit card numbers and confirm the purchase!   Single pricing: Are you fed up with fixed fees and minimum amounts? With PayPlug, there are no set-up fees, no commitment and no recurring fees. We only charge between 1,8% to 2,5% per transaction depending on your volume.   Security: All transactions and credit card data is protected with our top-notch security infrastructure. Our solution is compliant with Visa, MasterCard and Cartes Bancaires requirements. We use SSL 256bit protocols to encrypt credit card numbers and HTTPS payment form in order to provide the highest security level to our customer. PayPlug works with Mangopay and Payline, and the whole infrastructure is compliant with PCI DSS requirements.   Create your account now!
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: adyen
module.description: Adyen supports over 224 payment methods worldwide, and connects to 87 acquirers. With the Adyen plug-in you can accept payments online, mobile and at the point-of-sale
module.description_full: Adyen supports over 224 payment methods worldwide, and connects to 87 acquirers. With the Adyen plug-in you can accept payments online, mobile and at the point-of-sale. Risk management is included, as is full reporting and reconciliation. ﻿ Sign up
module.additional_description: Adyen is a leading provider of omni-channel payment solutions with over 250 payment methods and 187 transaction currencies. By operating from a single, Internet-based platform we make it easy for businesses to accept payments worldwide.

module.name: shopgate
module.description: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugi
module.description_full: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugin.  Integrating your shop takes a few hours with no investment! Benefit now from PrestaShop special offer to create your account! For the US
module.additional_description: This is the fastest way for your customers to find what they seek. With Shopgate, your mobile visitors will become customers: fast loading, optimised for touch screens, clear navigation, optimal mobile payment methods, SEO and branch locator with GPS.

module.name: realexredirect
module.description: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page
module.description_full: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page. If you don't already have a Realex account, you may apply for one on our website or call us on 020 3178 5370. ﻿   SIGN UP NOW﻿
module.additional_description: Download for free to benefit from great features such as: Unrivalled Customer Support﻿﻿ 3DSecure & Fraud Card Storage (RealVault) Dynamic Currency Conversion
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ferbuy
module.description: FerBuy is a payment method allowing merchants to offer risk free payments by invoice and in installments
module.description_full: FerBuy is a payment method allowing merchants to offer risk free payments by invoice and in installments.﻿
module.additional_description: The installation and configuration is fast and simple.﻿ As a merchant you can use FerBuy to benefit from more sales and a higher average purchase value. Your customers can pay later and they don’t have to use a credit card to check out. FerBuy comes at low fees for merchants giving you more margin on your sales. As FerBuy takes the risk for all approved transactions, there will be no risk for you as a merchant.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.description_full: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.additional_description: Attractive conditions Easy integration No registration required for your customers Accustomed use of your customers’ familiar online banking details Security thanks to a multi-level online banking authentication procedure Real-time transaction confirmation
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Start to collect reviews now and take the control of your online reputation with Trustpilot
module.description_full: Start to collect reviews now and take the control of your online reputation with Trustpilot. Engage the conversation and share your reviews on Google, Facebook, your website and on your public portal!﻿   Beneficiate now from a free trial !
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is the global standard for online trust. Trustpilot enables customer businesses to collect reviews, engage with consumers and share your most powerful marketing asset – real customers’ positive experiences.   Using the Trustpilot Solution to collect and display reviews is one of the most effective ways to build trust, confidence and credibility for your online store.   Trustpilot agreement with Google means that the reviews you collect feed directly into your Google seller rating account.   The power of displaying quality verified reviews in a prominent position through the customer journey via our easy to use widget is undeniable. Displaying reviews on site is proven to decrease shopping cart abandonment, increase basket sizes and most importantly increases sales conversions.   With a few simple steps, Trustpilot simple integration with Prestashop, means in a matter of minutes you too can share your real customer’s great shopping experiences to potential buyers.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: ecopresto
module.description: Ecopresto dropshipping is a platform that allows you to integrate many products in your shop in a few clicks
module.description_full: Ecopresto dropshipping is a platform that allows you to integrate many products in your shop in a few clicks. Simplify your sourcing and delegate your logistics!﻿  Contact the Sales Department by email Ecopresto info@ecopresto.com or phone +33 (0)2 51 44 82 17 This module requires a subscription to Ecopresto dropshipping services once downloaded﻿ from 149 euros per quarter ﻿﻿
module.additional_description: Dropshipping is an original method of delivery where your supplier  delivers your package﻿ directly to your customers on your behalf. Ecopresto, the ﻿French ﻿Dropshipping platform will assist you in your success.

module.description_full: Collect and manage Customer Reviews from your customers on your online shop. Increase customers’ trust for your store  and improve your ranking on search engines.﻿﻿   SIGN UP HERE
module.additional_description: ﻿Highlight and analyse strengths and weaknesses for your activity Publish the special Certification Seal, guaranteeing authenticity and trustability of the reviews Increase visibility on search engines with dedicated Feedaty Merchant Certificate pages You can rely on Feedaty’s customer support in any phase

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes. With easy PrestaShop installation, your business can start selling right away.
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from:   Fast merchant signup in minutes Simple, flat 2.85% + 30₵ rate and no extra fees Omni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce store Accepting major card brands Quick two-day funding Highest Level 1 PCI certification
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: Logistics management integrated ﻿and automated to simplify the transport and delivery of your products
module.description_full: Logistics management integrated ﻿and automated to simplify the transport and delivery of your products. You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics.﻿   Click here to sign up and start shipping !﻿﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.   Click here to sign up and start shipping !﻿﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: prestastats
module.description: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back
module.description_full: PrestaStats is the leading Business Analytics dashboard & Abandoned Carts Monitor enabling you to see business critical data from your PrestaShop store on any device, at any time, and as far back as your Prestashop store has been running.
module.additional_description: Know what’s happening on your PrestaShop store at any moment, from any device. PrestaStats gives you the power to drive your business to success with an easy to use, clutter free dashboard, that displays your most critical business data, in a visual and consolidated way.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: riskified
module.description: Riskified is a turnkey fraud prevention solution that reviews, approves and guarantees your orders
module.description_full: Riskified is a turnkey fraud prevention solution that reviews, approves and guarantees your orders. You decide which transactions to submit for review and Riskified provides clear, actionable, ‘accept’ or ‘decline‘ decisions instantly. All Riskified approved transactions carry a 100% chargeback guarantee, allowing you to sell with confidence.   Sign Up NOW!
module.additional_description: At Riskified, we pride ourselves on delivering our merchants with unmatched support and service. You will receive 24/7 development, analytical and account management support.   Frictionless customer experience Never cancel an order. No delayed orders. No contacting customers. Fast, constant review turnaround Scalable solution always providing instant approvals. Even during holidays and sales seasons. Never pay for a chargeback again All approved transactions carry a 100% money back guarantee in the event of fraud. Unlock new growth opportunities Sell everywhere and to anyone. Both locally and internationally. Eliminate false positive declines Riskified approves on average 70% of orders that merchants would otherwise have declined. Reduce the cost of managing fraud Riskified is a turnkey solution that replaces everything else, for less.

module.name: syspay
module.description: Bill the world ! No merchant account needed. Immediate activation
module.description_full: Bill the world ! No merchant account needed. Immediate activation. €1000 free processing to test us! Start now!﻿﻿﻿

module.name: affinityitems
module.description: Increase your sales by up to 50% thanks to personalized recommendations: give each visitor, on each page, the products that fit his tastes & needs and&
module.description_full: Increase your sales by up to 50% thanks to personalized recommendations: give each visitor, on each page, the products that fit his tastes & needs and benefit from higher transformation rate, average basket and visitors’ loyalty.﻿   Easy to install, this service has no fixed costs, requires no commitment, and drives a big bunch of profits. Take no risk: try and see!﻿﻿

module.description: Website and product reviews from your clients can increase your sales ! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your adwords stars thanks to our partnership with Google
module.description_full: Website and product reviews from your clients can increase your sales ! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your adwords stars thanks to our partnership with Google.   Try now ! 15 days for free !
module.additional_description: Collect and publish reviews from your clients with the trusted third-party Verified Reviews.    Why choose us ?      With Verified Reviews, you can now enjoy :    - A full tailor-made solution    - Packages including the collect of both website and product reviews    - Unbeatable prices-The best feedback rate of the market    - Great facebook applications - A certificate of authenticity    - Stars in Adwords thanks to our partnership with Google    - An offer WITHOUT OBLIGATION    Try now ! 15 days for free !
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: pigmbhpaymill
module.description: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions
module.description_full: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions.                                                                     Register your PAYMILL account  for free now!
module.additional_description: Integrating PAYMILL is a breeze, simply download the module to install and follow the steps  to sign up. Give your customers the flexibility of paying in a selection of payment methods, which includes all the major credit and debit cards   < Your Payments Secured /> With our Level-1 PCI Compliance we’ve got you covered with the highest security and data protection standards. Making it even faster for you to start accepting online payments.   < Accept Payments Worldwide /> Reach a global market by accepting payments from around the world and in up to 100 different currencies.   < One-Click Checkout /> Save your customer’s time by letting them store their payment information securely on our servers for future purchases. All they need to do is click to buy!
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: vtpayment
module.description: VTPayment creates payment addons for PrestaShop to help merchants accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders
module.description_full: VTPayment creates payment addons for PrestaShop to help merchants accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders. We are honored to provide addons to PrestaShop merchants with 11+ transaction currencies for options.
module.additional_description: Merchant could accept payments from more than 3.5 billion UnionPay cardholders, and this number is still increasing from time to time. Support multiple currencies for website pricing, and get all payment in 4 major currencies within only 2 business days for fast payout. Security, Satiability and Easy Management. Participate and enjoy various marketing events and activities to all Chinese under UnionPay family. Could register for a live account with few minutes, by updating account could upgrade account level and get to launch quickly.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue
module.description_full: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue. The claim is resolved in a couple of clicks, time is saved and customer’s loyalty increased.
module.additional_description: Youstice is a new-generation multilingual online tool, delivering fast and fair solutions to customer complaints all over the world. It helps companies seamlessly communicate and handle claims - both within countries and cross-border.   Through Youstice, in just a couple of clicks, both sides can communicate and negotiate directly, getting issues resolved within minutes. The process is standardized, automated and sophisticated, as it provides options for a constructive dialogue between the consumer and retailer. If no agreement can be reached, Youstice offers the option to have the complaint reviewed by a neutral third-party professional, by mutual agreement, for a quick and fair decision.   By resolving complaints rapidly and fairly retailers become trusted sellers, gain loyal customers, prevent negative feedback and make clients more engaged.   Watch our video and visit our website for more information.   Benefits Connect with your customers and increase their loyalty – thanks to a personalized approach to customer complaints You save time- solving a complaint takes just a couple of clicks You minimize negative reviews and prevent customers from posting future ones by resolving their complaints quickly and efficiently You get help with international expansion – you will get an access to our ecosystem of interconnected online markets, consumer organizations, trustmarks and ODR (Online Dispute Resolution) providers
module.author: Prestashop

module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface. DPD Poland offers the highest quality of services, which will contribute to your clients’ satisfaction. The DPD official module enables complete shipment management, allowing you to easily prepare the necessary shipment documents and tracking your parcel.  Register now
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user will gain access to important features for the easy handling and sending parcels.

module.description: Boost your online brand awareness by delivering banners on high profile media brands websites. Target your customers and your potential new prospects for your business
module.description_full: Boost your online brand awareness by delivering banners on high profile media brands websites. Target your customers and your potential new prospects for your business.   Start your campaign and benefit from up to 75% discount now!
module.additional_description: Set up your online advertising in 5 minutes Deliver your ad banners on high class media websites  Follow your performances on a customized dashboard A hotline to get answers to all your questions
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more
module.description_full: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more.  We offer the widest global support in the industry plus 110 different payment types including all of Tier 1 credit cards, diner cards, PayPal, E-checks and wire transfers. PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.   Sign Up Now!
module.additional_description: Sell globally with no development Easy all-in-one global payment module supporting VISA, MasterCard, Amex, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, Carte Bleue Paypal, Alipay, Ukash, Skrill, and more + 110 of the most preferred alternative payment methods worldwide Don’t install more than one module for payments Reduce cart abandonment with localized checkout pages Module automatically renders checkout page in shopper’s local language, local currency, and preferred local payment type More transactions approved because of our intelligent payment routing technology Competitive pricing starting at 2.9% + 30C per approved transaction Checkout page optimized for mobile and desktop
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: loyaltylion
module.description: Add a loyalty program to your store in minutes. Increase sales and customer happiness by offering points for sign ups, reviews, visits, referrals and purchases
module.description_full: Add a loyalty program to your store in minutes. Increase sales and customer happiness by offering points for sign ups, reviews, visits, referrals and purchases. Customers collect points and redeem them for vouchers to spend at your store, which increase repeat purchases. Gain customer insights like biggest refers and top spenders. Customize the design and text to match your store.   Sign Up Now!
module.additional_description: Increase basket size on average 9.4% Increase sales via repeat purchases Acquire new customers using our refer a friend feature Increase customer happiness Differentiate your store from your competitors Reach 1000s on social networks - read case study of a store who reached more than 10,000 people in 3 months. Why us?   LoyaltyLion is trusted by hundreds of ecommerce stores around the world. From small and medium sized stores to the largest in Europe.
module.author: Prestashop

module.additional_description: Increase Online Sales and enable customers to enjoy online shopping! Increase Average Order Value with Cross- and Up-sell recommendations Boost Conversion Rate with relevant product recommendations Increase Retention with personalized recommendations Learn more about your customers through a real-time dashboard view Reduce Bounce Rate with Top Lists

module.name: powatag
module.description: At Powa, we’re working with PrestaShop to revolutionize customers buying behavior
module.description_full: At Powa, we’re working with PrestaShop to revolutionize customers buying behavior. By adding PowaTag to your e-commerce platform you can offer customers a streamlined checkout experience. Create a free account now!
module.additional_description: Thanks to PowaTag, you will be able to: • Increase your mobile and online conversion rates • Allow customers to purchase straight from your product pages • Enable customers to download your catalogue and purchase at their leisure from their mobile • Experience an omni-channel solution that truly opens up new sales channels, generating new revenue for you PowaTag: The one-stop shop for retailers and brands.
